title: BRIEF-Airboss of America Corp Announces CFIUS Approval
text:
BRIEF-Airboss of America Corp Announces CFIUS Approval

Stock Markets 5 minutes ago (Sep 04, 2019 20:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Airboss of America Corp Announces CFIUS Approval Sept 4 (Reuters) - AirBoss of America Corp : * AIRBOSS ANNOUNCES CFIUS APPROVAL AND EXTENSION OF CONTRIBUTION AGREEMENT OUTSIDE DATE * OUTSIDE CLOSING DATE FOR TRANSACTION HAS BEEN EXTENDED TO JANUARY 1, 2020, BY MUTUAL AGREEMENT * AIRBOSS OF AMERICA-RECEIVED APPROVAL BY CFIUS TO CLOSE PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED MERGER OF ITS AIRBOSS DEFENSE BUSINESS AND OTHER OPERATIONS IN ACTON VALE

BRIEF-Airboss of America Corp Announces CFIUS Approval
description: BRIEF-Airboss of America Corp Announces CFIUS Approval
